description: Stay face-to-face with your baby while strolling. This adapter lets you securely attach an infant car seat to a Thule® Glide stroller.Works with both the Thule® Glide and the Urban Glide.Simple and easy installation.Compatible with the following car seats: Britax B-Safe, Britax Chaperone, Britax-Römer Baby-Safe,  Britax-Römer Baby-Safe Plus II,Chicco KeyFit, Chicco KeyFit 30, Combi Shuttle 33, Evenflo Discovery 5, Graco Safeseat, Graco Snugride, Maxi-Cosi Cabriofix, Peg Perego Primo Viaggio Sip 30/30, Peg Perego Primo Viaggio 4-35, Safety 1st Comfy Carry Elite, Safety 1st onBoard and Safety 1st onBoard Air.Notes: Recommended for strolling only. Not to be used with a second child in the seat.
name: Thule Glide 1/UG 1/2 Car Seat Adapter - Infants to Children
